Indonesian: iddemokratis (from Dutch nldemokratisch note: democratic republic" (in country names) translates as idrepublik demokratik
column4: such as in idRepublik Demokratik Kongo (Democratic Republic of the Congo))"

Indonesian: iddirektur from Dutch (and French) nldirecteur, idsutradara (of a film) from Sanskrit (through Javanese), idpengarah (for an event)
iddiskon, idrabat, idpotongan harga, idkorting from Dutch, less frequent
idsopir from French frchauffeur through Dutch, idpengemudi formal

idnarkoba (an acronym for idNARKotika dan OBat-obatan terlArang (narcotics and illegal drugs)), idNAPZA (less frequent – an acronym for idNArkotika, Psikotropika dan Zat-zat Adiktif (narcotics, psychotropics, and addictive chemical substances))
